DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish presence effect treatment ONO-2506PO patient Alzheimer 's Disease , base upon cognitive global scale .
DOC.brief_title: Effects ONO-2506PO Patients With Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis probable Alzheimer 's Disease use NINCDS/ADRDA criterion Standardized MMSE Score 13 24 point ( inclusive ) Modified Hachinski score equal less 4 Serious systemic disease may preclude survival study completion Other illness may include dementive feature
